class.rdfs:comment: A listing that describes a job opening in a certain organization.
class.rdfs:label: JobPosting

schema:baseSalary.rdfs:comment: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.
schema:baseSalary.rdfs:label: baseSalary

schema:benefits.rdfs:comment: Description of benefits associated with the job.
schema:benefits.rdfs:label: benefits

schema:datePosted.rdfs:comment: Publication date for the job posting.
schema:datePosted.rdfs:label: datePosted

schema:employmentType.rdfs:comment: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).
schema:employmentType.rdfs:label: employmentType

schema:estimatedSalary.rdfs:comment: An estimated salary for a job posting or occupation, based on a variety of variables including, but not limited to industry, job title, and location. Estimated salaries  are often computed by outside organizations rather than the hiring organization, who may not have committed to the estimated value.
schema:estimatedSalary.rdfs:label: estimatedSalary

schema:experienceRequirements.rdfs:comment: Description of skills and experience needed for the position or Occupation.
schema:experienceRequirements.rdfs:label: experienceRequirements

schema:incentiveCompensation.rdfs:comment: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.
schema:incentiveCompensation.rdfs:label: incentiveCompensation

schema:incentives.rdfs:comment: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.
schema:incentives.rdfs:label: incentives

schema:industry.rdfs:comment: The industry associated with the job position.
schema:industry.rdfs:label: industry

schema:jobBenefits.rdfs:comment: Description of benefits associated with the job.
schema:jobBenefits.rdfs:label: jobBenefits

schema:jobLocation.rdfs:comment: A (typically single) geographic location associated with the job position.
schema:jobLocation.rdfs:label: jobLocation

schema:occupationalCategory.rdfs:comment: Category or categories describing the job. Use BLS O*NET-SOC taxonomy: http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html. Ideally includes textual label and formal code, with the property repeated for each applicable value.
schema:occupationalCategory.rdfs:label: occupationalCategory

schema:responsibilities.rdfs:comment: Responsibilities associated with this role or Occupation.
schema:responsibilities.rdfs:label: responsibilities

schema:salaryCurrency.rdfs:comment: The currency (coded using ISO 4217 ) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.
schema:salaryCurrency.rdfs:label: salaryCurrency

schema:skills.rdfs:comment: Skills required to fulfill this role or in this Occupation.
schema:skills.rdfs:label: skills

schema:specialCommitments.rdfs:comment: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.
schema:specialCommitments.rdfs:label: specialCommitments

schema:validThrough.rdfs:comment: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.
schema:validThrough.rdfs:label: validThrough

schema:workHours.rdfs:comment: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).
schema:workHours.rdfs:label: workHours
